Portfolio

01

Campaign

HTML / CSS / JS / jQuery / GIT

This project is a campaign developed for "Rådet For Sikkertrafik". In this project, I designed and developed a dynamic website that should entertain and teach about the importance of being visible in traffic.
This project is a school assigned project.

02

ux boost

HTML / CSS / JS / GIT

This project is a UX optimizing of a subscription flow. I made this project for the company Bonnier. The purpose of this project was to increase the number of subscribers in the magazine I form. By optimizing the UX for the checkout process. This project is a school project.

03

yoburger

HTML / CSS / JS / PHP / GIT

I've been working at yoburger part-time as a frontend deveolper. In my role as a frontend developer for Yoburger, I have helped yoburger with optimizing their overall website, load speed, conversion from website to stores & S.E.O. I have also created internal web solutions to make the workflow at Yoburger lighter.

about me

hello,
i'm jannick holm.

Who is Jannick Holm?

Jannick Holm is a 21-year-old Copenhagen based frontend developer student at Københavns Erhversakademi. He is passionate about frontend development and spends most of his time on developing himself and his skills. He is an energetic, hardworking, and social person. And he does not love talking about himself in 3rd person.

My mission is to make the web a beautiful place.


As a frontend developer, I have experience working with:

    HTLM5, SCSS, JAVASCRIPT, REACT/REACT NATIVE, NPM, GIT, WORDPRESS & much more
